resources.string: ICPE is a open-source,free software.Opened source at https://github.com/ModelPart/Industrial-Craft-PE.git
ICPE is a free software.DO NOT sell it for the purpose of profit.
All release-versions of ICPE is allowed to be spreaded without asking developers.DO NOT spread beta versions.
ICPE is developed by ICPE Dev Team and MCAL Team.If some day ICPE stopped developing,you can continue to develop ICPE without asking us if it is allowed.
ICPE includes further libraries licensed under the Apache Software License 2.0.
ICPE also contains textures from Industrial-Craft-2 mod.
ICPE uses Cydia substrate under GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3.
ICPE uses code decompiled from Minecraft ： Pocket-Edition
